findings.title: Improved Initialization Logic in Dram::initialize()
findings.description: The `Dram` contract allows for lazy contract initialization and the implementation of the `Dram::initialize()` function can be improved by adding subcalls to `__DramMintable_init()/__DramFreezable_init()`.

findings.title: Trust Issue Of Admin Keys
findings.description: In the `Dram` implementation, there are privileged accounts that play a critical role in governing and regulating the token-wide operations.
